messages.subject: NHK Shinsengumi Soundtrack
messages.msgSnippet: Hello! Does anyone have the NHK Shinsneugmi Soundtrack? If you do I would appreciate If I could have at least the main songs. I tried to buy it online but I m
messages.messageBody:
Hello!

Does anyone have the NHK Shinsneugmi Soundtrack? If you do I would appreciate If I could
have at least the main songs. I tried to buy it online but I'm not sure whether I can buy
stuff from Japanese Websites. Please respond. Thank You!

-yuki-san
